org.jpws.pwslib.persist
Class StreamFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.jpws.pwslib.persist.StreamFactory

public class StreamFactory
extends java.lang.Object

StreamFactory obtains input and output streams from an application specific IO-context (ApplicationAdapter) and reproduces them in wrapping classes for the purposes of the backend library. It will not cause a functional error to address application streams directly at the adapter, but for systematic reasons and tracing and performance benefits, it is preferrable to use StreamFactory instead.

Method Summary

getInputStream

public static java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.lang.String path)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 ApplicationFailureException
Returns an input stream for a file that was obtained from the standard application IO-context (by default the local file system).

Parameters:
path - the file path for the file to be read
Returns:
a buffered input stream for the file specified
Throws:
java.io.IOException
ApplicationFailureException - if the IO-context fails to render an input stream
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is void or empty

Returns an input stream for a file that was obtained from the specified application context.

Parameters:
application - the addressed IO-context
path - the file path, valid for the application adapter
Returns:
a buffered input stream for the file specified
Throws:
java.io.IOException
ApplicationFailureException - if the IO-context fails to render an input stream
